allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Change MongoDB collection from locations to alerts

- Rename Location model to Alert model
- Update all references to use Alert collection
- This matches the existing alerts collection in MongoDB

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add debug logging to diagnose ESP8266 400 errors

- Log raw request body and headers for debugging
- Add error messages for invalid payload scenarios
- This will help identify why ESP8266 gets 400 while curl works

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix intermittent 400 errors by handling STATUS messages

- STATUS messages don''t have full GPS data, only update live status
- EMERGENCY and NORMAL messages still require full data for DB storage
- This fixes the intermittent 400 errors when transmitter sends STATUS

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Load latest alert from database on server startup

- Restore latestStatus from MongoDB when backend restarts
- Prevents "Waiting for data" message when Render spins up
- Frontend will show actual last position immediately

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Parse GPS data from STATUS messages for frontend display

- STATUS messages now get fully parsed (lat, lng, speed, etc.)
- Frontend will receive structured GPS data to display on map
- STATUS still not saved to database (only EMERGENCY/NORMAL saved)
- This fixes STATUS updates not appearing on mobile app

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Remove Track My Device button and enable auto-tracking

- Device location tracking now starts automatically on app load
- Removed manual toggle button for device tracking
- Tracking runs continuously without user intervention
- Updated UI to show "auto-tracked" in marker description

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
